headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ROSEMAN, VERA CHELNIK

snippet: ROSEMAN--Vera Chelnik, of McLean, Virginia and Winston-Salem, NC passed away peacefully on February 3, 2016. Born in Harlem, NY, July 25, 1921, Vera was the youngest daughter of Charles and Pauline Chelnik. Her siblings Mildred and Martin Chelnik predeceased her, as did her loving husband of 52 years, Alfred M. Roseman. She moved to Virginia in 2011 to be near her two sons, who survive her, Geoffrey L. (Jeanne Johnson) of Silver Spring, MD and Russell P. (Janet Silverman Roseman) of McLean, VA, together with their children, Deborah (Andrew Clevenger) of Falls Church, VA and David (Karin) of Philadelphia, PA. Funeral services and interment February 5, 2016, 11:30am, Old Montefiore Cemetery, Queens, NY. Donations can be made to a charity of choice. 1/3
